17  
18  package org.apache.log4j.config;
19  
20  /**
21   * Thrown when an error is encountered whilst attempting to set a property
22   * using the {@link PropertySetter} utility class.
23   * 
24   * @author Anders Kristensen
25   * @since 1.1
26   */
27  public class PropertySetterException extends Exception {
28    private static final long serialVersionUID = -1352613734254235861L;
29    protected Throwable rootCause;
30    
31    public
32    PropertySetterException(String msg) {
33      super(msg);
34    }
35    
36    public
37    PropertySetterException(Throwable rootCause)
38    {
39      super();
40      this.rootCause = rootCause;
41    }
42    
43    /**
44       Returns descriptive text on the cause of this exception.
45     */
46    public
47    String getMessage() {
48      String msg = super.getMessage();
49      if (msg == null && rootCause != null) {
50        msg = rootCause.getMessage();
51      }
52      return msg;
53    }
54  }
This page was automatically generated by Maven
